title: UN forces in Mali speed up withdrawal as security deteriorates
description: UN's impending pullout has fuelled tensions between Mali's military gov't and rebel Coordination of Azawad Movements.

title: Will COVID-19 ever go away?
description: The newest coronavirus variant is spreading fast across many countries.

title: Musk not serious about cage fight; time to move on, Zuckerberg says
description: Rival billionaire tech bosses apparently agreed to a brawl in June when Elon Musk tweeted he was 'up for a cage fight'.

title: Family killed in Russian shelling in Ukraine’s Kherson
description: A couple, their 23-day-old baby and 12-year-old son were killed in Russian attack on Shyroka Balka village.

title: Iran’s Shiraz shrine comes under second deadly attack in months
description: Last year's attack, for which two people convicted of being linked with ISIL were executed, left 13 dead and 40 injured.

title: Nigerian delegation says Niger military leaders open to diplomacy
description: Nigerian Islamic scholars meet Niger coup leaders as regional bloc ECOWAS explores options to restore civilian rule.

title: Miss Universe cuts ties with Indonesia chapter after alleged strip searches
description: Women say all 30 finalists for Miss Universe Indonesia were unexpectedly asked to strip for body checks for scars.

title: Star forward Kylian Mbappe reinstated by PSG
description: Superstar forward back in the fold after being sidelined for several weeks amid a contract dispute.

title: Pakistan security forces kill two after attack on Chinese convoy in Gwadar
description: The separatist Balochistan Liberation Army claimed responsibility for the attack on a convoy of Chinese workers.

title: Whitewashing slavery in US schools will teach students anti-Blackness
description: Black students who are exposed to a glossed-over version of US history will inevitably internalise anti-Black racism.

title: Scenes of devastation as wildfire burns Hawaii resort town
description: The confirmed deaths from the Maui blaze has risen to 93, making it the deadliest wildfire in more than 100 years.

title: Israel says no Jerusalem base for Saudi envoy to Palestinian Authority
description: Israel says the new ambassador can meet Palestinian officials but will have no fixed presence.

title: Argentinians set to vote in presidential primary: What to know
description: Argentinian set to decide who will go head-to-head in October's general election as the country faces soaring inflation.

title: Hawaii death toll rises to 89, making it deadliest US wildfire in 100 years
description: Resort town of Lahaina, home to more than 12,000, reduced to ruins by horrific inferno that swept through the US island.

title: A bit of splashy summer fun for Gaza’s amputee children
description: The kids at al-Qudra summer camp in Gaza bonded with each other as they splashed away the summer heat.

title: Slain Ecuador candidate’s running mate picked to run for presidency
description: Andrea Gonzalez to contest the August 20 polls in place of Fernando Villavicencio, his party announced.

title: China vows ‘forceful measures’ as Taiwan’s William Lai arrives in US
description: Beijing condemns William Lai's stopover in US, describing him as a separatist and 'troublemaker through and through'.

title: Colonialism and the Niger Coup
description: The military leaders of Niger can count on Nigeriens’ support thanks to anti-colonial sentiment — but for how long?

title: ‘Nail-biting win’ for Anwar as Malaysians back status quo in state polls
description: Political blocs split victories in regional polls, but opposition makes gains in challenge for ruling coalition.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 536
description: These are the main developments as the Russian invasion of Ukraine enters its 536th day.

title: Ecuador gang boss who threatened Villavicencio moved to high-security jail
description: A week before his murder, Fernando Villavicencio had accused Adolfo Macias of threatening him and his campaign team.
